original: Öhman, Arvid 0’skar Fredrik, fil. lic., Gö|teborg, f. 2/7/05 i Kristianstad av styckj. Janne Ö. o. Johanna Swensson. G. 37 m. Gertrud Bengtson. Barn: Rolf f. 38, Gunilla 41. — Stud:ex. i Kristianst. 23, fil. kand. i Lund 26, fil. mag. 27, fil. lic. 32, provår 34-36. Vik. adj. i Kristianst. 27, 28 o. 31, e. lär. i Ängelholm 33-34, v. Gbgs h. real 35-36, vik. adj. v. Gbgs h, latin, numera Hvit-feldtska h. a. 1., 36-37, e. o. 38. Ordf. i Gbgskrets. av Sv. extralär: för en. 38-41, ordf. i ett flert. studentfören. Stud:-vist. i Göttingen 28, Frankr. 31, UD stip. v. NF i Genève 31. Skr.: Ur Gustaf Adolfs skrifter (32), upps. i Statsveten’sk. tidskr. o. Sv. uppsl :bok samt div. bidr. t. tidn. o. tidskr.
translated: Öhman, Arvid Óskar Fredrik, MA, Göteborg, born 2/7/05 in Kristianstad to butcher Janne Ö. and Johanna Swensson. Married for 37 years to Gertrud Bengtson. Children: Rolf born in 1938, Gunilla in 1941. Graduated from high school in Kristianstad in 1923, received a Bachelor's degree from Lund University in 1926, Master's degree in 1927, licentiate degree in 1932. Substitute teacher in Kristianstad in 1927, 1928, and 1931, elementary school teacher in Ängelholm from 1933-1934, temporary teacher at Gothenburg high school real from 1935-1936, substitute teacher at Gothenburg Latin School and currently at Hvitfeldtska high school since 1936-1937, appointed as a deputy in 1938. Chairman of the Gothenburg district of the Swedish extracurricular teachers' association from 1938-1941. Chairman of several student associations. Studied in Göttingen in 1928, France in 1931, awarded a scholarship by the Swedish National Association in Geneva in 1931. Publications include contributions to the "Statsvetenskaplig Tidskrift" (Political Science Journal) and the "Svensk Uppslagsbok" (Swedish Encyclopedia). Also wrote various articles for newspapers and magazines.

memberOf.name: Gothenburg District of the Swedish Extracurricular Teachers' Association
